#########################################################################
model{
	C <- 100000
	# Truco de los ceros
	for (i in 1:N){
		zZ[i] <- 0
		zZ[i] ~ dpois(phi[i])
		fZ[i] <- (alphaZ / sZ) * pow(z[i]/sZ , -alphaZ - 1) * exp(-pow(z[i]/sZ , -alphaZ))
		phi[i] <- -log(fZ[i]) + C
	}
	# Aprioris O3
	alphaZ ~  dunif(0,10)
	sZ ~ dunif(0,200)
}

data
list(z=c(257, 198, 197, 189, 275, 241, 215, 210, 223, 213, 237, 283, 314, 268, 280, 231, 271, 287, 272, 213, 218, 286, 231, 237, 200, 242, 213, 282, 232, 239, 251, 322, 207, 246, 235, 280, 248, 228, 226, 223, 198, 209, 206, 199, 198, 278, 243, 295, 243, 215, 249, 232, 262, 233, 213, 231, 234, 231, 240, 258, 269, 240, 254, 239, 243, 281, 217, 232, 266, 266, 228, 234, 260, 236, 200, 203, 242, 192, 231, 206, 219, 309, 310, 248, 193, 236, 248, 214, 223, 205, 251, 239, 200, 227, 235, 209, 224, 226, 202, 236, 265, 257, 205, 276, 196, 232, 232, 239, 199, 214, 244, 227, 194, 178, 205, 194, 188, 245, 200, 189, 187, 201, 203, 202, 224, 232, 241, 182, 227, 256, 201, 237, 214, 185, 209, 224, 210, 223, 178, 210, 160, 191, 170, 194, 185, 163, 162, 202, 174, 199, 170, 178, 178, 174, 176, 200, 165, 188, 159, 169, 229, 184, 178, 203, 155, 178, 174, 173, 141, 144, 143, 147, 177, 185, 142, 167, 176, 177, 173, 198, 177, 205, 132, 188, 185, 164, 148, 157, 172, 164, 150, 155, 139, 152, 143, 167, 169, 163, 155, 128, 144, 135, 137, 125, 127, 141, 158, 149, 153, 155, 138, 137, 148, 143, 142, 162, 132, 139, 136, 174, 177, 135, 123, 150, 134, 127, 131, 147, 141, 167, 178, 139, 146, 152, 140, 137, 142, 148, 139, 137, 127, 114, 129, 161, 141, 181, 111, 126, 113, 155, 134, 120, 102, 136, 145, 146, 162, 150, 143, 131, 132, 131, 121, 150, 117, 127, 177, 144, 153, 131, 129, 123, 126, 128, 153, 147, 129, 135, 135, 184, 166, 147, 127, 122, 124, 138, 120, 114, 124, 144, 155, 142, 177, 144, 124, 125, 115, 136, 129, 145, 132, 138, 150, 157, 151, 141, 134, 133, 141, 148, 143, 139, 119, 161, 128, 144, 161, 127, 135, 133, 130, 115, 121, 118, 125, 135, 128, 126, 167, 130, 136, 117, 136, 128, 117, 123, 120, 129, 120, 134, 147, 106, 107, 112, 134, 116, 128, 131, 132, 125, 127, 149, 143, 139, 118, 117, 118, 125, 107, 117, 124, 136, 136, 133, 132, 130, 146, 135, 127, 124, 143, 112, 126, 152, 129, 150, 134, 146, 123, 116, 134, 134, 124, 130), N=384)
